col_shadow_hover="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)"][dfd_heading subtitle="A Presentation and Discussion" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h4|color:%23000000" subtitle_font_options="tag:h4|font_size:24|line_height:36"]What Just Happened? And What Can I Do About It?[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Unemployment is at Great Depression levels.  The S&P 500 fell 32% from February 19 to March 23, 2020.  And remains down about 15% to 20%.  What happened?  What can I do?  What’s it going to look like going forward?  Are there opportunities amid the rubble? Join Evan Press, CFP® as he tries to answer these and other questions.  Then join the open discussion to learn what other Retirement Group members are doing.  There may be some good ideas that we can share.  Or at least laugh and cry together. Join the Retirement Group as it joins the 21st century for our first webinar on May 2, from 10:00 am to 11:30 am.  Open to everyone, please see the webinar sign-in instructions below. The number of slots may be limited. In order to offset the Chapter's ongoing expenses during this pandemic period, attendees are requested to make a donation of $5 or $10. You may accomplish this by clicking here.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="PRESENTER'S WHAT HAPPENED? item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
